task.summary: Default task
First Commit, Setting up the basics and laravel

Got the nav in and showing up on pages, also tried to get a few more sections working but the code isn't functional so it is just sudo code at this point, going to have to rewatch some stuff to see if I can get it to work.

Have modified css to be templates since that is what they are and will cause less headaches in the future, I modified the migrations and did a dump autoloader to commit this change.
I also have creates working for templates and articles.
Began form for create users but keep getting exception and cannot figure out what I am missing, will look again later.
Have user create form now loading, was missing a few s at the end of words and didn't have the show written correctly in the controller.
have articles creating and storing in the DB, it passes to the article index but does not display articles.
have articles creating and storing in the DB, it passes to the article index but does not display articles.
all articles now display when clicked, had to revert to older ID method, will update evenetually maybe but probably not.
Template creation and review now works, form not 100% but it is now createable, reviewable, and needs edit and delete.
Template creation and review now works, form not 100% but it is now createable, reviewable, and needs edit and delete.
User not working but not needed yet.

All 4 createdable content areas can now be deleted with a button in the right hand side of each individual view as well as the addition of top line navigation, and button controls to access edit functions from both the index and each individual listing.

Tiny MCE now works, I had to use a script include in the nav file to get it in all places the nav is as the url helper url function is broken in all larvel past 5.0.16 and they haven't fixed it yet. This would cause a conflict so any text area now with the id of tiny will work as a tinyMCE text area.
tried to get search to work, code is there but not functional right now.
tried to get search to work, code is there but not functional right now.
User delete buttons, returns, edits, etc now are all functional, need to check if these are working correctly.
update password for user appears to be working now.
Middlewear written but having issue with eiditing permissions, can't seem to get the drop down box to display.
forgot to add adminMiddleware into the push

// realized that we may need to build the methods to show the relationships in permissions to users but can't think how to do it // right now. for the time being the auth has been commented out as it was moved to use the adminMiddleware which is currently erroring.
taking learning contract so taking a knee
Total VM crash and some work lost, I have fixed my VM and believe I have all work recreated. I do not have usr creation working yet, getting some weird error.
noticed a few typo errors
Create user seems to be working again but they are not creating entries onto the pivot table.
Auth works atleast for admin level accounts, need to work on it a bit more but it works on articles and templates and is disabled on others.
I am wrong it is not working yet, the pivot table is now being seen but no data is being entered.
I am wrong it is not working yet, the pivot table is now being seen but no data is being entered.
you can not create users and edit users with multiple permissions level and the middle wear now works. I need to correct select to work for multiples.
you can not create users and edit users with multiple permissions level and the middle wear now works. I need to correct select to work for multiples.
selectivize now works.

all created by and modified by are now tracked, we have a seeder working just need to add --seed to the end of the migrate refresh, all created and edits seem to work and a default user of findlay@example.com with a password of use has most authority on creation, think he is missing editor but you can login and add that yourself.
prep to switch to mysql instead of sqllite.
All success messages added for update, create and delete/
